s.text: i am waiting to hear from you soon.

i am waiting to hear from you soon.

i hope that all is well with you, My name is Miss Faith ,i know that you may be suprise how i get your email, i got your email today when i was browsing looking for honest partner,then i feel to drop this few line to you , and i will like you to contact me through my email so that we can know each other and exchange our pictures, and we maybecome partner.
Date: Thu, 20 Jan 2011 15:14:44 -0800 (PST) From: Faith Aburey <juliet0-1@att.net> Reply-To: faith.
